scenario_text.value:
Hey, Takuma. There’s something I’ve been
meaning to ask you for a while now.

What would you say is the most important
thing to you?

Don’t ask me such weird stuff out of the
blue, man.
I just wondered, is all.

(Agumon has a serious look on his face. What
is he trying to get at?)

(Lots of things are important to me—friends,
peace, my life.)

(But the most important thing to me up to
now? Hmm...)
(To me, the most important thing is...)
World peace?
My friends?
My own life?

It’s gotta be world peace. For both worlds,
of course.

With all the people and monsters in these
worlds, I doubt any of them wanna die.

I want to protect all of them, if I can. Is
that a weird thing to say?

Nope, it’s not weird at all! I feel the same
way!

I guess that’d have to be my friends, you
know?

You and all the others who’ve taken this
journey with us are very important to me.

So, I’m one of the most important things to
you?
Of course you are!
Ahahaha! That’s great to hear!
(And...that includes Miyuki and Haru.)
In the end... I treasure my life.
The idea of dying scares me.

Plus, protecting my life means protecting
you, too. Isn’t that right, Agumon?
You’re thinking of me, too?

Well yeah. Ours is a bond that’ll never
break.
I see, hee hee...
What made you ask in the first place?

Well, the thing you wanna protect most is the
thing I wanna protect most, too.
I just wanted to check what that was, is all.
Oh, so that’s it. Thanks, Agumon.

I’ll protect what you wanna protect, so lemme
know what I can do to help!
